AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Renowned Scientist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] became an expert in the field of shielding. [PAWN_pronoun] even taught at the Daystrom Institute from time to time.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Monk
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] decided to devote themselves to logic and became a resident at a monastery.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Diplomat
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was an established and accomplished diplomat for the Federation. Their work immersed them to many different cultures but [PAWN_nameDef] never strayed from logic.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Unexpected Chef
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] defied all expectations and became a skilled Chef. Many people doubted that a Vulcan could make food with such taste, but they soon dropped that expectation.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Child of Logic
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on Vulcan, to two Vulcan parents and a normal Vulcan life. They were taught to repress their strong Vulcan emotions since birth.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Aspiring Scientist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised on Vulcan by his Scientist parents. [PAWN_pronoun] was raised to follow in their footsteps.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Aristic Genius
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on Vulcan and quickly realised [PAWN_pronoun] has an aptitude for art and focused on building this skill, at the cost of a social life.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Martial Arts Champion
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] found a passion for hand-to-hand combat during their youth, [PAWN_pronoun] went on to win many competitions.
